Description: Adds randomized role list generation to Custom!

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Role Bucket Chance
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a role bucket being chosen instead of a role.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Maximum Modifiers
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of modifiers that can be selected when using /randomall without values set.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Maximum Bans
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of bans that can be selected when using /randomall without values set.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Pandora Cap
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of natural Pandora members that can exist.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Compliance Cap
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of natural Compliance members that can exist.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Randomize Lobby Info
CheckboxSettings.Description: Randomizes the lobby name and icon when running /randomall.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-Add Necro Passing
CheckboxSettings.Description: Automatically adds the Necro Passing modifier to the role deck in BetterTOS2 Custom  when running /randomall if possible.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-Remove Slow Mode
CheckboxSettings.Description: Automatically removes the Slow Mode modifier when running /randomall if possible.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-Remove Perfect Town
CheckboxSettings.Description: Automatically removes the Perfect Town modifier when running /randomall if possible.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Auto-Remove Teams
CheckboxSettings.Description: Automatically removes the Teams modifier in BetterTOS2 Custom when running /randomall if possible.
